## CreateCookieOptions.maxAge property

The 'Max-Age' attribute of the cookie (See [RFC6265 Section 5.2.2](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc6265.html#section-5.2.2)<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
maxAge?: number | 'Infinity' | '-Infinity' | null;
```
